title: Auth (Coming Soon)
desc: A complete User Management system that works without any additional tools; fully integrated with your database instance; ready with social logins!

features.title: OAuth2 & Social Logins
features.desc: Google, Facebook, GitHub, Azure, Gitlab, Twitter, Discord, and Bitbucket.

features.title: Client-Side & Server-Side Libraries
features.desc: Incredibly simple APIs! With powerful libraries that work on client and server-side applications.

features.title: Fully integrated
features.desc: Instant Authentication, Authorization, and User Management system on top of your database instance.

features.title: Robust. Auto-Scaling.
features.desc: Think big on an enterprise-ready infrastructure! Scale up with no extra effort.
